title: Dragon Ball - Super Broly (Doujinshi)
description: Shortly after the events of Dragon Ball Super Broly (movie), Broly is suffering from night terrors owing to a combination of his father's death and his own unmanageable power. Terrified that he might hurt his friends in a rampage, he goes to see Cheelai in the middle of the night seeking consolement.

matches.title: Azur Lane - The Older Sister whose Younger Sister is the Best at Everything (Doujinshi)
